title: How to Make Watermelon Donuts

steps.headline: Cut out donut shapes from seedless watermelon.
steps.description: Make 1 1/2-inch (3cm) thick round slices of watermelon with a hole shape cut from the middle part.

steps.headline: Sweeten the sour cream by stirring in the sugar.
steps.description: To lighten it even more, add a touch of vanilla extract (essence) to taste.

steps.headline: Frost half of each watermelon donut slice.
steps.description: Then sprinkle this slice with the slivered almonds.

steps.headline: Add another layer of a watermelon donut slice to the first slice.
steps.description: Again, top this with the sweetened sour cream.

steps.headline: Sprinkle the top layer with toasted slivered almonds.

text: Cut out donut shapes from seedless watermelon. Make 1 1/2-inch (3cm) thick round slices of watermelon with a hole shape cut from the middle part. Sweeten the sour cream by stirring in the sugar. To lighten it even more, add a touch of vanilla extract (essence) to taste. Frost half of each watermelon donut slice. Then sprinkle this slice with the slivered almonds. Add another layer of a watermelon donut slice to the first slice. Again, top this with the sweetened sour cream. Sprinkle the top layer with toasted slivered almonds.  Serve.
